title: Vayne vs Draven
body:
Hey guys I been thinking about which adc is better.
I know they are both hard but which one would be the strongest champ??
currently I main Ashe and Jinx
Thank You

replies.body:
Strength in League is relative. Every champ has an ideal scenario they would like to be in, both in terms of power spikes and enemy compositions. 

If Draven gets ahead early, which his passive allows him to do, he is in a position to end the game early. When the enemy is unable to pin him down long enough to outright kill him he will usually 2-3 shot enemy squishies. This is when Draven is strong.

If Vayne reaches 3/4 items, or god forbid gets further then that, she is in a position to single-handedly win the late game. When the enemy is unable to pin her down, especially by revealing her position when invisible, she will be able to kill nearly *anyone* she wants (the speed at which depends on build). This is when Vayne is strong.

The thing is both have high skills caps. Without mastery over the champ neither is as strong as they can be. Draven can roll through laning or he could fall behind and do nothing. Vayne can win the late game or she can never reach it at all.

Prepare to practice which ever you pick.

in an even skilled vayne vs draven matchup, draven should win 9/10 times, at least.

> [{quoted}](name=Third Reich,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=wBxOjcTL,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-10-05T01:11:59.358+0000)
>
> Draven will beat Vayne, early, mid, and late game.
> 
> I'd go Draven over Vayne. Embrace your inner tyler1.

vayne wins late game. all you gotta do is stun him against a wall and it's a free kill.

Wtf are these guys serious?

Vayne is probably the strongest ADC right now (if you can play her well of course - she can take some time to learn) due to her being buffed two patches in a row. Her only downside is that she is picked and banned very often.

Yes, Draven would win in a 1v1, but if your talking about who is the all round better ADC, Vayne is definetly the way to go.

P.S. I main ADC and my two most played ADC's after Vayne are jinx and Ashe so I got you bro ;)

Draven will beat Vayne, early, mid, and late game.

I'd go Draven over Vayne. Embrace your inner tyler1.

Draven is probably the most fun adc pick if you love going on a rampage with that smug ass personality with a passive that basically says look at me. When you stomp your opponents into oblivion you can only hear the crowd cheer over the deathly screams of your victims screaming. Each time you pop into a fight any squishy will be instantly deleted and any tank will be sent running in the opposite direction.

i would say draven hes got good power early to late, good kit, global ult so if your a jinx and ashe main you should pick the ult up fairly easily. just play some customs so you get used to catching your axes and you'll be sweet.
He can one shot very easily late game
